content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of sept. 19, 2011 - around 7:30pm, my wife, my little boy and i walked about a mile up the street from our north texas home to an elementary school so that our little boy could use the playground...And we could wear him out to get ready for nap time later. we spent about 30-45 minutes at the playground as the skies quickly became dark and night fell. we stayed a while after it got dark and decided it was time to walk back home.

as we proceeded to walk north down church st., we noticed that the skies were very clear, as we could see many of the star constellations and took note of the little and big dipper. we noticed a few planes flying over in their normal landing procedure, strobes on as well as landing lights lit up - as is common in the skies above north texas, with busy dfw airport to our south. i took note of an airplane coming in to my left (from the west) that i thought i would play a joke with my wife and claim to be something out of the norm. we got to about the halfway point between our home and the elementary school playground, again facing and walking north on church st. when the plane coming in from the west was right above us. i pointed up at the aircraft and exclaimed "what is that??". i noticed she looked up as well and my son, of whom i was carrying (due to scraping his knee at the playground) saw it as well.

about a second after we all three were looking up at the airplane, i noticed something barely visible in my right side peripheral vision to the north east and quickly looked over for my eyes to focus on what it was. i noticed my wife turned her head to look at the object as well. at what seemed like the exact same time, her and i both pointed at this object that would not have been visible had you not been looking right at it - it would have been very easy to miss; we both said "what the hell is that!?!" followed by "are you seeing what i'm seeing??" - in a way trying to re-assure each other that we both were seeing this ufo. 

as we both stared at the object, which appeared to be flying direct - from north to south at a constant speed and altitude, we both tracked it with our index fingers, pointing at it the whole time. the object was v shaped, however more rounded at the front - more like a boomerang, and huge in size that made absolutely no noise at all. initially, the object looked to be similar in altitude to what a landing aircraft would if it were heading to dfw. as the object was near directly to the east of us (to our right), i quickly realized that this object appeared to be much higher, more like in the mesosphere...Almost like it was poking into the atmosphere. i have seen shooting stars and have seen the space shuttle and iss as they have passed earth; the shuttle i have also seen re-entering. this was nothing remotely similar to these occurrences. this object was larger than any aircraft, blimp, flock of birds; anything flying for that matter, that i have ever seen. the object was unified and solid in shape, it did not change, it did not get bigger nor did it get any smaller or change direction and again was at a constant altitude for the entirety of the duration we saw it. the ufo also was traveling very quickly - from the moment we first saw it to the moment at which is disappeared to the south was about 20 seconds. what was so incredible was that an object this massive in size made absolutely no noise at all. shaped like a boomerang, only the front of the "hull" was visible. the object itself had no lights nor emitted light. it was almost as if light was reflecting off the front of the craft so you were able to make out that something was there in the shape of a boomerang. the rest of the craft was almost blurred and the closest comparison would be like in the movie "the predator", when the predator turns invisible; you can still make out he is there because objects behind him are blurred.

after the object disappeared and we could no longer see it (almost like an airplane traveling away from you becomes so far you cannot see it), my wife and i looked at each other and asked "who is ever going to believe us?" as we continued our walk home, i continually began reviewing everything in my mind so as not to lose any detail. i wrote an email to my parents that night describing what we saw in detail to document everything. i also quickly started to seek images and youtube videos from the internet, trying to find anything close or exactly like what we had just seen. after searching and searching - most the artist renderings or images that i found were too v shaped, i decided to create my own rendering of what we saw.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped large object flying directly north to south at high altitude emitting no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up around 4 am and rememberd i forgot to unplug the christmas lights. went down stairs and as i looked at the christmas lights on out side i saw a really bright object past the trees. very bright like the moon or something. i sat in the chair next to the window and just looked at it and it seemed to move alittle and i thought it was a reflection. i unplugged the christmas lights and it was still there. i just kept looking at it and then got up and got some water and used the bathroom. came back to the window and the light looked futher away and had to lean way down to see it so i thought that could not be a star. got my coat and walked out to the road wearing my underware. way down the road i could see it and it was large and bright white. looked like it was palusing or has a movment to it. got really wondering and ran in the house got my car keys and shorts. ran out to the road and it was not there, jumped in my car and drove a mile or so and saw it again. it was moving to the west so i stopped and tried taking some pics and a video with my phone. just sat there and wathed it and it slowly moved to the west and just got smaller and smaller. went home and just thought what was that.
content.summary: Saw something very white in the sky looked like a star but was bigger and very bright,

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving eastbound on allen avenue when i observed an orange flickering object in the sky between the moon and a clearly visible planet.  the object was below the scattered cloud cover and started descending slowly.
i pulled over to the side of the street and exited the car with a digital photo camera.  a bystander that was in his driveway also looked up and asked what the object was.  i explained that i could not identify it either and that is why i started to take photographs.
i observed the object for several minutes as it slowly moved southbound across the eastern horizon and took a number of photographs of the object until it slowly moved out of sight.  there was absolutely no indication that the object was any sort of known aircraft or balloon especially due to the brightness and color of the object which was as bright in the sky as the moon and remained a red-orange hue for the duration of the flightpath observed.
content.summary: Glowing orange light in the sky that moved slowly and flickered randomly.

content.detailedDescription:
[email addresss removed/cms/tg]

i had flown into st thomas from florida the fall on 1990. 
i arrived at 2:15pm. i lived in the virgin islands and florida and traveled back and forth all the time..
i then attended at public rally for the re-election of gov.Alexander a.Farrellys second term . we left the rally and went to a friends apt.
it was a clear and sunny day without a cloud in the sky. we were all about to sit down have something to eat and drink,when a  friend looked out of a large picture window and noticed a huge massive cloud formation in the sky.
we all saw helicopters marked and unmarked approaching the cloud formation.
the rest of the sky was clear blue. a yellow golden,pinkish light beamed from the clouds at one of the helicopters. the helicopters immediately withdrew.
for a brief time we all witnessed a huge massive ship just hovering over the in the sky over land and water. it appeared to be smaller metal shaped moving things surrounding the large ship. another friend looked down on the ground area in low landscape area and noticed a copper ,toy like looking robut thing moving back and forth. in serious shock and awe,we were all wondering. what the frick was going on! before we could reach for a camera it was all over! i remember looking back into the sky and we all lost time for several hours. two of my friends were so freaked out they never wanted to talk about it. the next morning there were reports called in all over all over st.Thomas and neighboring islands, including, st.Croix, the british  vi, and others. the national guard and news media told the public it was just a storm passing,but it was witnessed by a large mass of people. 
 i have had other close encounter experiences that i just held to myself and would never talk to anyone about. i can remember things as far back as being four or five years old.  as a child, i was born and raised in chicago.
i remember being very small and telling my parents about the big owl like beings that come to me at night with a taller one that had a hood or veil.
they always had a fowl odor with long dry scabby looking hands. 
i would always come up missing in the night! i would tell my parents the owl people take me through the ceiling and into the sky.
i remember waking up a floating into the sky! my parents just chalked it up to a big imagination.
strange events escalated and i stared sleeping walking at night.
 my parents started nailing the windows closed and putting large two by fours across the front door at night night because , the university of chicago police would find me sleep walking in my hyde park neighborhood.
closing the doors and windows off is a serious fire violation.
 securing the house did not stop my sleep walking or disappearance at night. sometimes,they would find me with a thick smelly substance all over my hair. it would  give off an electrical charge and shock when you tried touching or attempting to remove it. it would just dissipate into thin air. (so strange)  
i have had many disturbing experiences throughout my entire life.
 one of the worst experiences is having had severe nosebleeds and fungal infections following an bad encounter.
i was told that i would never remember anything but i recall a lot in complete detail and other things are slightly foggy.
things have been very quite for approx. twelve years and now i am experiencing loss in time,night terror, dancing wavy lights in my room at night and other strange events.
anyone else suffering like this? 

regards,
content.summary: I was with the other friends and witness this event we swa a robut  copper figure on the gound-helecopter inthe air then they backed off we lost all lost time.Other people reported this to the radio and news, all over the island -

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on november 6th roughly about 7:30 with my girlfriend and we noticed a bright glowing light in the sky beyond the trees.  i said to my girlfriend what is that and she said it was a helicoptor.  i got up and walked in the direction of the object and looked more past the trees.  i said that is no helicopter and it certainly was not an airplane, my girlfriend was standing next to me now and we both just stared at the orange glow.  it was almost like a mini-sun.  we where both not sure what we where looking at but agreed it was unidentified.  it would get very bright then it would get dim. then it would get very bright again and slightly move its direction upward then downward. after about the third time it flared up it eventually got dim to the point it dissappeared altogether gradually.  this lasted for about 3-4 minutes. it was a pretty amazing experiemce. my girlfriend who had a bad headache prior to the incident had claimed her headache was gone after seeing the orange orb.  i dont know if there is any relevence to that but i felt it had something to do with it. also we felt we where meant to see the orb. we both had that feeling. very strange.
content.summary: Very bright object in the sky witnessed by my girlfriend and mysel. almost looked like a mini sun in the night time. lasted a few minutes then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of sunday, november 6, 2011 at 7:00pm est my wife was outside our home (which is 3 miles southwest of frankfort,kentucky).  she noticed a bright pulsating light to the north-northeast.  i went outside and immediately noticed the object, which was about 40 to 45 degrees above the horizon and appeared to be hovering over downtown frankfort, kentucky.  object was noticeably brighter than stars in the sky. weather was clear at the time, no clouds noticed in the area.  when i first saw it, there appeared to be two smaller red pulsating objects circling below it, then these disappeared.  the main object appeared to occasionally give off a flash of white light, kind of like a photography flash bulb.  object was hovering at high altitude, much higher than the helicopter traffic we often see in this area.  it did not emit any noise.  object moved up and down very rapidly but remained fixed over the same area around 7:15pm. i am estimating it was 3-5 miles away, guessing in the area of the intersection of highways us-127 and us-421, this would be on the north side of frankfort,ky.  we observed this until 7:30pm and went back inside.  i went back out at 8:00pm, the object was still in the sky in about the same position as before.  at 8:15pm, object also appeared to fall suddenly dropping maybe 5 degrees on the horizon.  at this point, we saw 3 small but very bright red lights dropping down out of the main object one right after the other.  two of these began heading due west at slow speed.  the third red light remained hovering below the main object, then at very high speed moved towards the other two red pulsating lights.  they then moved into a triangular formation and headed off due west at slow speed.  at this point, i went inside and got a set of binoculars, through the binoculars i could see that each of the red lights was actually 3 pulsating red lights in a v or chevron type shape.  hard to tell size but definitely in a v shape and flying in formation.  the red objects did not emit any sound.  at 8:20pm we noticed a similar object to the east had appeared also with the same pulsating green, red, yellow lights. then about 8:25pm we saw the eastern object drop suddenly in altitude and stop. suddenly the eastern rotating object dropped a single red flashing light...Through the binoculars it also appeared to be 3 flashing lights in a v-shape, also headed due west at slow speed.  same type of 3 sets of pulsating red lights in a v-shape as the previously observed ones.  aropund 8:45pm, the westernmost object moved south at slow speed towards us, this would have put it over downtown frankfort,ky or us-127. the eastern object i would guess would be in the versailles road/us-460 area maybe ?? we called the franklin county, kentucky dispatch center non-emergency number, they said quote "what do you want us to do about it ?" the dogs in the area have been barking continuously all night since about 6:30 if that means anything at all.  at 10:30pm this evening we went back outside, we observed that both of the main objects were gone.
content.summary: Noticed bright hovering object in northeast pulsating green/yellow/red lights, dropped 3 small red pulsating objects.  similar pulsating object appeared in the east, also dropped one pulsating red object.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 13th, 2011 our cruise ship, the carnival glory was headed south from halifax, nova scotia towards new york city. the weather was rather unpleasant that night and my wife and i had just returned to our stateroom after eating dinner. it was cold, dark and kind of stormy outside but i wanted a cigarette so i threw on a bathrobe over my clothes to keep warm and went out and sat down and lit up a smoke. the next thing that happened was the most amazing thing that's ever happened to me in my life. 

i am 57 years old and am a very skeptical person. i am not religious and do not believe in bigfoot, ghost and that sort of thing. i have always believed in ufo's but have never been able to be sure about them because i never saw one myself before. that all changed when i was sitting out on the balcony having a smoke that night. the next thing i know a silent cylinder with rounded ends comes into view, flying silently from the south heading north. it couldn't have been more than 300 feet from me and about 150 feet above the water. as it reached the back of the ship it angled down and then curved around the back of the ship and was gone. 

i stayed outside about 20 more minutes hoping it would return with no luck. the entire incident only took about 6 seconds from start to finish but i am now convinced that ufo's are real. it was silent and it didn't appear to be emitting any light of its own. it glowed because our cruise ship was lit up like a christmas tree and the light from the ship was what illuminated the object.  i think i wouldn't have seen it at all had it been farther from the ship. 

looking back i now wish i would have reported it to the authorities on the ship. if someone was on the bridge they had to see it as well so there must be some sort of record. their is a bow camera that may have filmed it as well. i have been looking for other reports from that night but the weather was so nasty it's possible i was the only passenger who happened to be out on the balcony at the time this thing passed by us.  my gut feelings tell me that it spotted us and swooped in close to check us out just as a tourist would pull off the road to see something. anyway, i know what i saw and i now have absolutely no doubt at all that we are not alone. i also understand when i hear someone say they saw something that seemed to be otherworldly because this sure didn't seem to be military.
content.summary: Closeup sighting of silent craft - update from my original report

content.detailedDescription:
Go to elizabeth river boat landing park in portsmouth, va. via google maps an use sat view...And check close in on the water area just to the north of this park...You can see the light array under the water...Since latest images from sat...

could this be a uso? or many of them?

if you click on google maps now you can see it....
content.summary: Found on google maps over a bay in portsmouth va, a submerged light pattern...Go to location below...Can see with google maps

content.detailedDescription: While visiting the cape may county zoo with my wife and grandson, we were in the process of eating our lunch at the picnic tables and i looked up and saw a large plane flying over and i noticed a flask of light. the altitude of the plane was approximately 20,000 feet and flying in a north/east direction. it was apparent that a silver like cylinder was flying along side the airplane.  at first i thought it was a military plane and was being escorted by a military jet but the object had no wings.  it was shadowing the large commercial jet towards the rear of the plane.  the objects distance from the plane looked to be a full wing span. i could see the sun reflecting off the cylinder and i managed to finally take a few photos but the photos show that i did not capture the object because of todays digital cameras. its almost impossible to see anything on the small screens. i just started shooting photos in the general direction and one photo did capture an object in it. the object looks dark gray in color and it looks to be at a lower altitide than the jet that passed over.  i have one original photo and one photo of a rendering of what i actually saw. i have also included a google earth photo of the flight path of the object. i am a chief investigator with mufon in new jersey. if you are not looking up into the sky, you will never see a ufo. the time of day was 1.23 pm and the sky was partly cloudy. no winds notices and the temperature was aprox 65 degrees.
content.summary: Observed a silver cylinder flying next to a commercial airliner

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work driving eastbound on highway 24 from orinda, ca. to pleasant hill,ca. at 11:15 pm. just before i got to walnut creek i noticed up in the sky these 4 glowing white and red objects flying in formation in a row. they were flying east to west and spread out in a straight line north to south. the distance between them changed enough to show that they were not just one object. also after a few minutes they seemed to scatter in different directions and lost sight. the objects were much brighter then the normal airplane lights that were in the area and seemed to be moving rather slowly but covered lots of distance so that after approx. 4 minutes, they had disapeared. there were clouds in the area but the lights were glowing steadily and very bright with a reddish glow on bottom and whiteish glow on top of each orb. these lights were unlike any i had seen before and very unusual in their formation.
content.summary: 4 distinct glowing orbs flying in formation over bay area. white light on top and red light on bottom of each orb.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late night in late october early november of 1975 i was a 10 year old child.  at that time i was going through a late bed-wetting phase and remember i was determined to end that embarrassment.  i awoke for the second or third night in time to relieve myself and remember being happy and proud that i caught it in time again.  

as my eyes creaked open slightly i saw movement in the room and at least what i thought were african american kids in my room moving around.  i remember thinking that the only thing they could steal of any value was my prized small black & white tv that was on my dresser next to my bed.  as you can imagine at this time my heart was pounding through my chest and just wanted them to take the tv and leave.  i creaked my eyes open ever so slightly as not to be noticed and was shocked to realize that they weren���������t afro���������s (which were common at that time) but were whole heads. 

i can���������t really express my thoughts of that instant realization when i saw who was really in the room at that time other than how in a nanosecond i went from (there���������s no such things as aliens-to-oh, my god there real-to-what do they want).  at that time there was no such things as ���������greys��������� or anything similar to what has been so defined into pop culture today.  

being late october early november there was a harvest moon and i had a fairly large picture window in my room which lead to some fair amount of ambient room lighting which i shared with my 5 year old brother who slept in a adjacent bed next to mine.

during this event i was creaking my eyes open enough as not to be noticed, laying on my back when i woke up and my bed covers were at my waist.  all i wanted was to get my bed cover up to my head so i was ever so slowly and methodically creeping them up during this entire event. as not to be noticed.  there was a larger one that stood against the wall directly across from the foot of my bed that just stared at me.  there was another knelt down on the opposite side of my brothers bed and what i thought at the time was that he was doing something to his arm.  

i my head at the time my mind was reeling, my parents room was directly behind me and if i screamed my father would come running in.  i remember thinking that the one next to my brother i was taller than and equated him to being in ���������my grade��������� remember i was 10.  so if he came over to me my big plan was to jump up and dive on him and scream for my dad.  the one against the wall just standing there i remember as being a grade or two older than me and he would probably do something before my dad to get in.

i remember thinking i could end the whole debate that are we alone in the universe and the weight of that thought being succumbed to he���������s killing my brother and not being able to muster the internal strength to do something.  my next thought was that if he comes over to me he can���������t put a needle in me so i started to tear up and that diffused my sight to what was happening in the room.

then the one that was knelt next to my brother got up and came at me, pure horror as my eyes were teared and he rounded my brothers bed and in one motion knelt down on his right knee and in one motion opened his toolkit and kind of flipped and twisted his left wrist and reached in.  at that very moment i couldn���������t hold it anymore and thought needle! and i made a audible pre-cry whale.  the face that the creature made still haunts me today.  honesty.  it���������s the same face people make when they make a surprise mistake a ���������eek i did something embarrassing��������� facial expression.  his mouth was just a slit so when he made that expression his face rippled and wrinkled like a old man.

immediately whatever he was taking out of his box which was a really weird shape then but not now, it was (hexagonal with a diagonal opening and handle) put it back in got up and they marched out.  again another part of this is memory that has crept me out is how they moved like the military and moved or better said marched out of my room.  i was shocked and with unreal timing as i looked down the hallway when they past my parents room two more came out and filed in line which such precision and marched down the hall and all turned down the stairs out of my sight.  

again i must stress the timing was if they were one.  needless to say i didn���������t sleep the rest of the night.  my younger brother was fine in the morning, and no one in my family knew anything of the nights event.  i lived near a large metropolitan area at the time and our house was the only house surrounded by 260 acres of woods.

i only told a handful of people since then and find it very difficult and seriously doubt many of these accounts i read of abductions myself.   ironic isn���������t it.  they were very, very real, and i wish i dream't it but i didn���������t.

my impression then and my life of the events of that night is that these beings are cold and indifferent to us, basically they are not our enemies but most certainly aren���������t our friends.  there might be a very good reason our government has kept this secret for so long.


side note:
physical appearance is not as "sinister" as depicted.  more of blue/grey artic silver color than grey. bulbous joints with slightly distended stomachs, very similar to dwarfism.  seen mouth slits move slightly along with large head movement just as like they were speaking but heard nothing.
content.summary: 1975 close encounter of the third kind

content.detailedDescription:
I live on a farm that faces a major highway. i took the dogs out before going to bed and i was star gazing, as i always do when i am out with the dogs at night, when i first noticed the object. at first it looked like a star, but since i am always looking at the same sky, it looked out of place. i had never noticed such a bright "star" before. as i continued to look at it, i realized it was flashing different color lights and started to make a pendulum like movement but very lightly. that is when i ran in the house to get my husband and binoculars. with the binoculars i could see the object more clearly. at first it was flat on the top with little red, green, blue and yellow lights flashing, but emitting a net like appearance on the bottom. it looked almost like a disco ball on the bottom with the different lights.

about an hour later, as i continued to watch i saw an airplane come by and we thought it was coming to investigate the object. as the airplane approached the object, the net like aura that appeared on the bottom part of the object was like retracted and the object shifted from its original location and that is when i could see clearly the dish shaped object with a bright light on top and the little flashing lights going around. it stayed like that for a short time (a few minutes) then it moved again. as time went by the object would move a little higher and a little higher until it was impossible to see any detail, not even with the binoculars.

in addition to me, both my husband and daughter witnessed it. we were all shocked at first and just in total disbelieve of what we had witnessed. to prove to myself what i had seen the next night i went out and looked for it, but there was nothing there other than the stars that are regularly there.
content.summary: Initially appeared to be a star until lights started flashing

content.detailedDescription: At 6:48 pm object appeared hovering then moved southeast slowly.  observed object disappear behind the mountain known as high knob.  object was round and glowed white continuously.  silent movement and remained steady in a path...Moved slowly.
content.summary: At 6:48 pm object appeared hovering then moved southeast slowly

content.detailedDescription: My gf and i were leaving a benefit held at the sons of italy in hingham.  the sky was completely clear, with a clear view of the stars.  as we were walking to the car i felt the "urge" to look up the sky (find out my gf had the same "urge" to do the same).  when i did i saw a very bright objet covered in white and red light shoot across us.  the object was low in the sky, approximately 200 or so feet off the ground.  i would say the object must have been between 20-30 ft in diameter and it was going in a west to east direction.  at first i thought was seeing a meteorite, but realized it was extremely close to us and rather large in size.  i shouted "look!" to my gf.  it also appeared to slow down as it passed us, but at its highest speed was still faster then any plane i have seen. if it was a meteorite of that size, going that fast i would suspect we would hear a sonic boom or at least a crash, but it was completely quiet.  after watching it for maybe 5 seconds it shot off into the sky at close to a 90 degree angle leaving behind a slight reddish aura/ trail.  you could not see the object traveling thru the air, so it looked more like it almost just vanished or at least travelled faster then the eye could follow. my gf then said "omg did you see that", i said yes and we discussed what we both saw, and tried to think of possible explanations.  we stayed outside for another 5 minutes looking up in the sky to see if anything else happened, but nothing further happend so we went to my car to go home.  i did not have any alcoholic beverages prior to the witness and my gf had one.  we both said how we felt the "urge" to look up in the sky right at that moment.  for those that watch the show fact or faked on syfy, the object/ light looked exactly like the object that the investigator filmed while doing an investigation at area 51 that aired this season.
content.summary: Fast lighted object flew over us, slowed down, then shot off into sky

content.detailedDescription:
Just sitting in my living room watching tv when the lights appeared in the east.  i thought it was a haloween prank.  it moved like looking glass moves when in slow flight out of offut field in omaha, but it was dark, and the only visible thing was the ring of about 9 bright, white lights that were boomerang shaped with the front of the boomerang in front.  could not tell how high it was, and my guesses on elevation assume something like a 747.  when it turned to the west it was approximately over the new tudor road that is just south of my house.  i didn't go to the west window to look at it since i thought it was a prank.  i thought it might be a small aircraft pulling a series of kites with flares on each one.  

no noise noticed, but i was inside and my hearing is not good and i also have tinitis.  the flares looked bright white, but i observed them through a window that is treated with low-e coating and it is loaded with argon.  i do not use glasses for far vision, and i have good far vision.

i read about similar reports in the lees summit paper earlier this week, so i thought i had better add my two cents.  

i did not note the time exactly.  too bad i didn't have a camera handy.
content.summary: Saw 9 outlining lights slowly approaching from se to ne then turning to head due-w; large like a 747 might in slow flight

content.detailedDescription:
While walking on upper shelf moor near glossop just after the daylight faded, a series of dull thuds were heard and felt by all three people. shortly after reaching the footpath, a light was spotted in the sky above the edale area. this light was moving slowly towards manchester, resembling an aircraft. however it shot sideways, covering around five miles in less than a second and then stopping dead. it then started shooting in random directions, hovering in a stationary position, then surging. it seemed to have white light coming from it. after a while moving around the sky a white beam of light appeared to emit from the bottom of the object. shortly after this two fast jets were seen moving quickly into the area, the object then moved away from them, back towards manchester. we then lost sight of it and a helicopter with a searchlight was seen in the area, sweeping the ground. this made us all quite anxious so we decided to get back to the car. i managed to get a photo of this object, showing three stars as a reference, with the motions of the object over four seconds in the lower left corner.

while walking back to the car, we looked behind us with a torch, and a reflective object was seen on the ground by me, bouncing the light back to us. this was approximately where we had been earlier when we heard the thudding sounds. upon pointing this out to the other two people, i shone the torch back to where i had seen the light and a dark cylinder was seen shooting up into the air from the exact location of the reflective object just seconds earlier.

we then left the area quickly and got into the car, seeing nothing else. the link below details where we were stood throughout the duration of the event. the thudding sounds were heard further back, to the right of the large plateau.

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fluttering light over moorland and flying object in close proximity to witness

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside at dusk watching the evening stars start to appear when i noticed a very bright one i hadn't seen before. then noticed it was moving due east. my first thought was that it was the asteroid that was making the close approach to earth. i watched it move in a very direct path and as it moved it got noticebly smaller and fainter until it dissapeared over the horizon. all of this took about 5 min. i went inside and looked up the ateroid only to find out it wasnt going to be visible to the naked eye and not even to telescopes until the 8th. this was not a plane and it was still too light out to have seen a satellite, plus satellites dont appear this big and then get noticebly smaller. as a reference when i first saw it i would say it was twice as big and bright as the brightets planet visible in the east which i believe is venus. from my vantage point, venus is about 10 degrees above the horizon by the time the sun has faded enought to see, and this object appeared at about 30 degrees and then moved due east until it went beyond the horiazon.
would be curious if anyone else witnessed.
thanks much
(name removed to fi field) cms 11/06/11 17:27 cdt
walsenburg co
content.summary: Object moved due east and dissapeared over horizon

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting took place in richlands, nc, near usmc camp lejeune.  i've never been in the military, nor a pilot, but i am a fan of military aviation and flight simulation, come from a military family and am very familiar with all types of military aircraft.

it was, i believe, late fall or early winter, the end of the year, in 2009.  i had taken the dog out on a leash into the back yard.  i'm not sure of the exact time, but it was dark, with a clear sky, and i could see the stars well.

while the dog was doing its business, i stood motionless, just looking up at the stars, enjoying the crisp night air.  i may have been staring at a single point in the sky, hoping to spot a satellite with my peripheral vision.

what i saw was at first just a single tiny, white, unblinking light moving across the sky above--but then i realized it was accompanied by two other identical lights, flying in a triangular formation.  once i made that realization, i noticed that the area between the lights was devoid of any stars--it was a solid triangular craft that made no noise whatsoever, left no visible exhaust, had no colored or blinking lights of any kind.  i am unable to say with any certainty the altitude of the craft, but my guess is that it was fairly large and 5 to 10-thousand feet up.  it moved quickly across the portion of the sky visible directly over my position, in a straight line, without any unusual maneuvers.

i remember thinking how ridiculous it was for me to see this thing so suddenly and unexpectedly, and for it not only to be flying over a town instead of a remote rural location, but for it to be in such close proximity to a major military installation.  sure, it could be something covert and man-made... and i'm not claiming it isn't, but it does fit that 'triangular ufo' shape that seems fairly common these days.
content.summary: Nighttime black triangle with 3 white lights, no noise, straight flight path.

content.detailedDescription:
I should start by saying that i was completely sober at the time that this occurred and had not used any foreign substances - alcohol included - anywhere near the time that this happened (months, not hours.) i should also state that i have no psychological disorders. i am also not a "visiting extra-terrestrial" believer, although who is to say what the distant future holds. this was too odd not to report.

it was around 7:45 - 7:50 cst with today's nov 6th time change taken into account (i.E. it would have been 8:45 if it happened yesterday.) i was driving home when a bright light caught my eye, a quick glance to the se caught my eye then and i was back to driving. it became instantly noticeable that it didn't go away after a second, so i looked back at it thinking that it must just be a reflection from a very far away airplane as i see sometimes when the sun is coming up, then it started getting larger. i have to admit that i didn't pay attention to how fast the size change occurred, but from what i remember it seemed to happen in 3 stages which took maybe 5-10 seconds. it started small like a very far away aircraft, then slowly it flashed like a reflection and it was medium sized, and then slowly flashed again and it was larger (it's largest.) since this questionnaire uses aspirin as a size comparison, i'd have to say that, at it's largest, if i held up a pill of aspirin to compare it to that the object would probably have been approximately 3/4th the size of the pill. i kept looking at it for a couple of seconds trying to find a sign that it was in fact an airplane that was moving away from me and just had a weird reflection - but then something stumped me: it went from looking like it was flying away from me to moving down, all in a sharp curve motion over the space of say, half an inch? it continued on a downward path when i almost went off of the road so i quickly stopped my car (the road was empty, no cars.) i got out to see if i could get a better view and had been standing outside for maybe 10 seconds when i noticed that it started changing from white-orange to a white-green. this really stumped me and i didn't know what to make of it so all i could do was keep watching it. that's when i noticed that it started gradually getting smaller (no reflecton-type flashes this time.) it continued getting smaller and smaller while fading to white. when it got back to the original pinpoint size it made a semi-sharp right and i accidently looked away for a quick second because i saw something in my peripheral vision and when i looked back to keep watching it, it was gone. i'd have to say that by my best estimation, the entire event lasted about a minute, but i'm not sure because it really seemed like two or three.

really no idea what to make of it, i'm still dumbfounded by the whole thing. if you were in the area and saw it then make a report and i'll google again in a month or so to see if there were any reports made.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An orange (pinpoint) light which then got larger, then got smaller and smaller until it dissipated. it then faded to a white-green, then faded to white, then dissapated. it started with a curve then went in a straight line and curved again.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my boyfriend to work. i waited for him to lock our door when i looked up and saw over 50 star like ufos traveling north to south past the taurus constellation and disappear just past orions belt. all i could say was "whoa..." my boyfriend didnt know what was going on he asked me whats wrong and i told him what i saw it only lasted abouy 15 seconds but i was still in shock. just about 2 days before i seen the same type of objects but about 7 or 8 in a v formation. im shocked at this activity im just in awe.
content.summary: Looked up and saw over 50 orange star like ufos flying in formation then  they they disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my bedroom at my computer, at about 10pm on or about sept. 26, 2011 when a thought occured to me that i needed to go outside at that moment and look up at the sky to the south.

i went outside and witnessed an orange orb, about 400 feet in the air passing  over the neighborhood and heading slowly, silently in a south-southwesterly direction.

the orb was approx. 50 in diameter and was translucent.

as it passed over the city it dropped two other, smaller orbs and then all three moved out of sight range.

they were very beautiful and since i expected to see something up in the sky, i watched them drift off into the night sky, wondering when i might have a chance to see them again.
content.summary: Orb passed over house heading south-southeast and dropped two other orbs.

content.detailedDescription: It was oct. 10, 2011 at approx. 7:12am. i was driving down a back road towards walkertown, nc to scout some potential hunting land i had gained permission to hunt this year. as i was driving, a flock of canadian geese caught my attention flying just north of me. as i watched the geese gain height out of this field, i caught a glimpse of a large object disappear behind some trees on the other side of the field. i slowed down and pulled to the side of the road. after waiting several minutes, i observed the object just east of my location. at first, because of the distance i thought it may be a large military air-craft. i have seen large planes in this area before as the airport is not that far away. as it got a little closer, i could clearly see that this was no plane. i must say that i was very uncomfortable about what i was seeing. as it got closer i could see that this was something i was not suppose to be seeing. i even questioned myself at the time. i can't begin to explain why i stood there and watched the object, because the sight of it really scared me. the object was rectangle and was about maybe 2 or 300 feet in length. there were 4 amber colored pulsating lights on the rear of it. they seemed to get brighter as the object moved up the field and dim as it hovered. there was an arm-like structure connected to the right side of it. it almost looked like some type of camera arm. it was round, tube shaped and extended down toward the ground. i could see that the very end of it was black looking in color. the entire object was a dull silver color and had a rough looking surface on the bottom. it continued to hover slowly over the far end of the field. all of a sudden, it started moving up the field and slowly banked to the right. when it made this turn, i was able to see the top right side of it. again, it was a dull silver color and was rough looking. i did not hear no sound coming from it. it was about 450 to maybe 500 yards across the field from where i was standing beside my truck. i continued to watch the object as it flew up towards the upper end of the field. again, it stopped and hovered as if looking for something. after hovering it again banked right and disappeared behind the trees. upon standing there and watching it go behind the trees, i could not help but to get into my truck and try and follow it. once i was able to reach the next road to turn down, it was a dead-end. i never saw it again. i have told no one about this besides a friend of mine and he suggested reporting it here. this was not a man-made object, i stood there for about 4 or 5 minutes watching it. i have never seen anything that i could compare it to. i can't get what i saw off my mind. it has gotten so bad that i tend to talk about stuff like this to friends and family never discussing what i actually saw but instead just venting to try and calm my thoughts about it. i don't want to be labeled as crazy but, i know what i saw. i have not drawn a picture pertaining to what i saw because i am trying to forget about it, but i can submit one if needed.
content.summary: Very large object observed in the country over an open field during am hours

content.detailedDescription:
I was out side in the back yard during the day and i noticed a couple of little white spheres floating around in between the clouds at a rather high altitude. there was two connected to each other and they didn't seem to move with the wind but they were changing position constantly. 

  then i saw a mass of about five more in a kind of geometric shape again not moving with the wind but always rotating the points of each sphere that made up the mass. i know most people would say that's just a bunch of balloons but the wind was 7 mph ssw and these guys just weren't moving that way.How ever someone in the area did release a bunch of reflective multicolored mylar balloons around the same time and these did in fact float directly past my stationary ufo objects.

 once i started observing these objects more intensely the spheres would disappear  and reappear in groups and shapes in different locations.This seamed kind of like a game, if i had doubt about what i was seeing i could pick a new place to look in the sky that was clear and they would appear there out of thin air. no movement to or from those points in the sky, they would just materialize.

 this lasted from about 2 in the afternoon until sun down. these objects formed triangle formations composed of three spheres spaced out at least 80 to 100 feet apart and stayed in one place for up to ten minutes.They appeared in groups of two at closer distances and orbited each other in a circle like pattern. and the they also appeared and disappeared in line pasterns composed of 3 to 4 spheres lined up in a row. one on the end of the line pattern would disappear and re appear at the front of the row of spheres continuously. 

every thing i saw these objects do seemed like it was designed to get my attention and show a sign of intelligence. these little guys were so interactive it was amazing. if i thought of  two, one, or three  of them, that many would appear were i was looking up at!

the only other activity i found could be related is that when this all occurs animals tend to act funny. birds would circle the area like they were trying to get there bearings and dogs would bark for a little bit when the sighting first starts up. also i cant forget to mention that i have witnessed planes fly at these objects or directly were they had been moments ago as if they are tracking the spheres or attempting to move them along.
content.summary: Round sphere like objects appearing and dissappearing in groups and formations.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch, and i walked onto the front lawn to look up into the sky. i noticed one of the constellations, and was trying to find more. i saw an abstract light formation in the north-west sky. upon seeing this object, i knew it was no star, but some sort of ufo. the lights were moving their formation rapidly, with the brightest staying in the middle of the group. the lights started to disappear, as in fade against the sky, and they had stopped their movements. this was after roughly 7 minutes of observing the object. the lights had come back into the view after about 2 minutes of being "gone". upon seeing this, i was awestruck, as it was the first of such things i have seen. i was still very excited when i went to report it. i had not actually lost sight of the object, but i had headed inside.
content.summary: Walked outside, looked into sky, saw said light formations.

content.detailedDescription:
A series of orange-red orb like lights in the northeastern sky, parallel at the time to northern cross, which was in the northwestern sky. drifted across the sky, for the most part, in a straigth horizontal line. at the same point on this path, each of them disappeared. the lights appeared out of nowhere in the east and moved toward the west. they moved at a steady pace and did not wobble or move off course. more than 14 appeared. the first group was a line of 5. most were in a straight line, one was lower. the next group had three that formed a triangle. the last few came individually. there was an airplane visible in the same general area, revealed by its blinking white lights. the sky was entirely clear, zero cloud cover. stars very bright and visible.
we were driving south down rochester road in troy, mi when we saw the lights behind us to our right. we stopped and viewed them for approximately 10-15 minutes, until none appeared.
content.summary: A series of orange-red orb like lights in the eastern sky, parallel at the time to northern cross. drifted across the sky, for the most part, in a straigth horizontal line. at the same point on this path, each of them disappeared. more than 14

content.detailedDescription:
On november 5, 2011 at 12:45 pm visibility was unlimited, with a few cirrus clouds in the southern sky,  while playing fetch with our dog at a park on a plateau in central toronto, canada, an aircraft was noticed moving from the southeast towards the northwest  at first when it was noticed by my girlfriend, it was staying at the same altitude and thought to be a white blimp type aircraft. she noticed that it did not appear to be in a normal flight pattern as usually seen from the park with commercial aircraft that are landing at the pearson international airport and that it was moving slowly. there was some unusual banded marks around the centre that looked like rings that went around the centre of the aircraft that were elevated slightly from the surface. she thought i could identify it and brought it to my attention since i had spent several years with military aircraft. there was no noise emanating from the aircraft. the commercial aircraft that we normally see in the area are usually in the landing pattern of pearson international and you can hear the aircraft engines as they ascend and descend. 

i thought it was a porter airlines bombardier q 400 flying out of billy bishop ( formerly toronto island) airport heading towards a northwest ontario destination ascending from 3000 feet to 5000 feet.  the vertical stabilizers of porter aircraft are painted in a blue theme so i thought the tail was blending in with the blue sky and the aircraft was banking so that the wings and turbo prop nacelles were at a 90 degree angle and so were not visible. so i waited a few seconds for the angle of sight to change and it became apparent that there were no tail services or wings visible. all that was visible was a white fuselage with no visible means of support and the aircraft then began to ascend rapidly from 5000 feet to 20,000 feet. it's heading then changed to due north and it accelerated to what appeared to be over mach 2 with no sound and rapidly disappeared from view. 

we were somewhat astonished that we had witnessed this on a clear day over a major city.
content.summary: Moved from se to nw ascended from 3000 ft to 5000 ft  then 5000 to 20000 ft in 3 sec turned north and exited at over mach 2 with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were watching tv at approximately 10:05 pm when my wife looked out our bedroom window and noticed a strange object in the sky with a pulsating strobe light. we observed the object due east at our two o'clock. it was out over the atlantic ocean which is approximately 1/4 mile from our location. i estimate the object was further out over the ocean. in the course of observing this craft two more appeared in the same part of the sky. all three objects had three lights that emitted a steady glow and a pulsating strobe that circled around the object. the objects danced in the sky and seemed to jump up and down. i brought out my binoculars and went out onto my roof. there i observed over the next thirty minutes four additional objects. two were in the same part of the sky where my wife first observed the initial object. one was far to the north, approx 5 miles away and moving inland. the other appeared from the southeast and continued north ! up the coast and disappeared. these craft would move, appear stationary and then move in the opposite direction or up or down. approximately midway through the sighting, an aircraft flew directly overhead from the direction of either lakehurst nas or mcguire afb and flew diectly toward one of the objects. it appeared to be a large four engine aircraft, either a transport or a tanker. both disappeared into a cloud bank. we live close to an approach pattern for newark airport and are used to seeing commercial aircraft. these objects were not flying in any sort of pattern. 

my wife who is a confirmed skeptic wanted to report the incident to the police while it was happening. instead we tried the nuforc hotline but the center reporting mailbox was full. we would be very interested to know if any one else shared these observations as this part of the coast is heavily populated and many people were out and about this saturday night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple pulsating objects observed over atlantic ocean.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on bridge street in farihaven mass towards mattapoisett mass. and the end ot the road is a stop sign, at which point you take a 90 degree turn left or right. as i was rolling up to the stop sign, i looked up and noticed three orange bright lights in the sky across the street about 100 yards away over the woods. at first i thought it was just a radio tower and i looked away but then it hit me there are none in that area so i quickly looked back. the lights formed a right triangle

                                           o                               o




                                           o
in that pattern. the orb all the way to the right began to flicker and slowly move further away from the other two orbs. once it moved for about 20 sec they all just vanished at the same time. from where i was the orbs looked to be about the size of a golf ball if you held it an arms length away from you. once they disappeared i threw my car into reverse and drove down the road further away from the stop sign and then put it into drive and went back to the stop sign to see if i lost sight of them just by the angle i was looking at them but they were no longer visible.
content.summary: Three glowing orange lights formed right triangle, one light moved further away from other two then all vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was awaken to my room vibrating around three am tuesday morning. i felt and heard this over my tv on a volume of 20, on a 1-70 volume span. i expected the sound to go away when i turned off my tv and computer, instead it doubled in clarity. i went outside at this point in time (3:30am) and heard the most terrifying sound i have ever heard. the duration was until i fell asleep sometime after 5:30am. the sound was an oscillating hum, low in frequency, accompanied by the sound of mass air being moved, and a high pitch squeal that changed pitch in accordance with the hum. the sounds sounded to be coming from every direction of the sky. there was also an intermittent "jet engine" type sound, that sounded like a jet coming towards you, but would stop after only 2 or so seconds of the sound. almost like a huge blow off valve maybe? i fell asleep listening to the sound, that never got quiet. (with windows closed) the next few nights of staying up late to record the sound has proved to be useless as the sound has yet to return. this sound was extremely eerie, and left me feeling very stressed over the next few days.
content.summary: I awoke to a horrible, terrifying sound of an oscillating hum, low and high in pitch.

content.detailedDescription: This is my second sighting in 6 weeks and i consider myself privileged to have had two sightings in one lifetime.  this one kind of gave me the jitters.  this sighting took place november 5th at 17:16 hours. my wife and i just finished working on our home and had to go to pick up the wife's car that her son had at his work.  while she went inside i waited in the parking lot outside the store.  something caught my attention out the corner of my eye.  when i looked up there was a glowing red orb coming acrossed the sky moving from east to west very slowly until it passed over head.  i went into the store and told everyone to come out to witness a ufo or orb.  only 2 employees came out to watch the glowing orb. it then picked up an incredible rate of speed and within 3 or 4 seconds it was almost out of site when it blinked out and disappeared.  it was incredible and the people were amazed and went back into the store.  about 30 seconds later a second red orb came into view following the same trajectory as the first.  i ran back into the store and yelled that another orb is coming a crossed the sky again.  this time about 4 or 5 of us were now outside to watch the orb and were amazed at what we were seeing.  it again did the same exact thing as the first and blinked out.  after all the excitement was over my wife and i went to get a bite to eat at burger king in the same shopping center.  when we came out 15 minutes later after eating we noticed 5 large aircraft circling and criss crossing as if in a grid search. we left that area and was going home when i called my brother and told him what had just happened.  he thought i was nuts and told me he had guests over and couldn't talk long. he said so if i go outside i'm going to see all the aircraft.  i said "yes and that i will be at his house in about one minute".  as i pulled up he was walking out front of his house with his guest and said so where are all the aircraft?  i said look up brother and when he and his guest saw them he couldn't believe what he was watching.  he was quite surprised and said that he was not sure what they were.  he said they are not fighters since he knows what fighter aircraft were after being on the uss enterprise in an a6 squadron.  all five aircraft were identical to each other and no sound.  they were circling and criss crossing for almost one hour and then headed back toward mcguire afb in new jersey. this is the second time in 6 weeks that orbs were in this area.  the first time they were white orbs and this time they were red. the description of the orbs were star-like shaped and were bright red and pulsating.  at first they looked like they were just floating through the sky then took off at an incredible speed and blinked out. i tried to take pictures with my camera phone but there was too much white light from the parking lot.
content.summary: Two brilliant red glowing orbs moving slowly from eeast to west then leaving the area at an incredible high rate of speed and blinked out.
